0x3422291C.name: APPLY_WEATHER_CYCLES

params.name: numEntries
params.description: The number of cycle entries. Must be between 1 and 256

params.name: msPerCycle
params.description: The duration in milliseconds of each cycle. Must be between 1000 and 86400000 (24 hours)

examples.code:
-- Cycle between XMAS weather for 30 seconds (3 * 10000 milliseconds), and SMOG weather for 20 seconds (2 * 10000 milliseconds)
local success = SetWeatherCycleEntry(0, "XMAS", 3) and
                SetWeatherCycleEntry(1, "SMOG", 2) and
                ApplyWeatherCycles(2, 10000)

0x3422291C.resultsDescription: Returns true if all parameters were valid, otherwise false.
